msgSnippet: Setup will always be called before every test method.  If there is information that you want initialized OAOO, you can put it in your constructor. -Jason

Setup will always be called before every test method.  If there is
information that you want initialized OAOO, you can put it in your
constructor.

-Jason

    > -----Original Message-----
    > From: Grant Lewis [mailto:lewis@...]
    > Sent: Monday, June 25, 2001 4:10 PM
    > To: JUnit
    > Subject: [junit] Running setUp once for all tests in a test suite
    > 
    > 
    > Can somebody help explain how to setup a TestCase so the 
    > setUp method is
    > executed once for all the tests. I posed this question a 
    > week or so ago
    > a and never received a reply with sufficient detail 
    > explaining how to do
    > it. Somebody suggested I look at the TestSetup class in 
    > the extensions
    > package, but I didn't get very far with that approach.
    > 
    > Any help appreciated.
    > 
    > Grant
